_header: A marvelous thing I have mused in my mind
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 29.
_description: A carol of the Incarnation — three quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘Mirabilem misterium / The Son of God ys man becum’

BLLan379.First Lines:
A mervelus þyng I hafe musyd in my myndeHowe that
                        veritas spronge owghte of the grounde…
BLLan379.Last Lines:
…That we maye be sauyd on domusdayeAnd browghte to that blysse
                    he bowghte vs to

Rickert,  Edith,

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 109.
